scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run test && npm run synth
scripts.kind:recreate: npm run kind:delete && npm run kind:create
scripts.apply: npm run compile && npm run synth && kubectl apply -f dist/
scripts.elasticsearch:ping: PASSWORD=$(kubectl get secret elasticsearch-es-elastic-user -o go-template='{{.data.elastic | base64decode}}') && kubectl port-forward service/elasticsearch-es-http 9200
